summary: "Industry" is a TV drama that started in 2020. It's about young graduates trying to get jobs at a top London investment bank called Pierpoint & Co. The show first aired on HBO in the U.S. and BBC Two in the U.K. It was popular, so it got renewed for more seasons. The second season premiered in 2022, the third in 2024, and a fourth season is coming soon.
title: Industry (TV series)
